title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 456.1 - Declaratory rulings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 456.1 - Declaratory rulings

State Regulations

Any person may petition the Power Authority for a declaratory
ruling with respect to the applicability to any person, property or state of
facts of any rule or statute enforceable by the Power Authority, or whether any
action taken by it should be taken pursuant to a rule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
456.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
